title: Gentleman Gnar price
body: So Gentleman Gnar is said to be priced at 975 RP but like a lot of other skins have been will it have a 30% price reduction for a short time when it is first released or will it be full price when they release it? I'm really hoping that it is slightly reduced because I don't quite have 975 but any info helps a lot. Thanks in advance. {{champion:150}}

replies.body: 1350 RP skins are on sale for 975 RP at launch. 975 RP skins are full price at launch.
the 35% price reduce usually only happens to 1350 skins
